14.7: And the border went up by the valley of the son of Hinnom to the south side of the Jebusite; the same is Jerusalem; and the border went up to the top of the mountain that lies before the valley of Hinnom westward, which is at the end of the valley of the giants northward.

17.15: And the border went down to the end of the mountain that lies before the valley of the son of Hinnom, and which is in the valley of the giants (Rephaim) on the north, and descended to the valley of Hinnom, to the side of the Jebusite on the south, and descended to 'En-rogel.
17.27: And Zelah, Eleph, and the Jebusite, which is Jerusalem, Gibeath, and Kirjath; fourteen cities with their villages. This is the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families....
